data.title: "fish+tank" in Being John Malkovich (1999) stills and screengrabs
data.meta_description: Movie stills and screengrabs from Being John Malkovich (1999) stills and screengrabs that have been tagged: fish+tank on the worlds smartest cinema stills and research site.
data.text:
July 2016 a NYC based cinematographer had to come up with a lighting plan in hurry.

After becoming quite frustrated with the options available for searching through film grabs for reference material, they hammered out this jammeroo and called it "SHOT.CAFE".

Use it to create decks, moodboards, lookbooks, research and explore your love of cinema, cinematography and design. Or don't.

Expect new features to appear unannounced. Other details may also arrive soon.

Wanna contact us? Try the 'gram: @the.shot.cafe.

Privacy Policy | Terms of Usage
